fields.title: Our scientific fields at a glance

future.title: Do you know who you want to be?
future.subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

cards.knowledgeText:
Studying science teaches you to think critically and reject misinformation.

You gain up-to-date knowledge from your field.

It gives you confidence and problem-solving skills.

You learn to search for and evaluate information.
cards.futureText:
Science lets you see the future.

It helps you understand connections and causes.

Through science, you can not only watch but also create the future.

After graduation, you’ll have stable career options.
cards.funText:
You train your brain by solving tasks and challenges.

You meet new people with similar goals.

Study programs let you explore new countries and cultures.

Internships give you real-life experience in amazing places.

wide.title: Wide scope of study
wide.text:
The faculty offers a wide range of study programs,
covering practically all areas of natural sciences.
Besides standard fields like mathematics, physics,
geography, biology and chemistry, we also have
ecology, economics, informatics and gemology.
This gives students broad options.

cont.title: Continuity from Bachelor to Master
cont.text:
Not every faculty guarantees that after completing
a Bachelor's you can continue in the same or similar
program without transferring.

modern.title: Modern environment
modern.text:
In recent years we used EU funds to modernize
equipment, IT and dorms. Our premises meet
21st-century standards. With the AgroBioTech center
we acquired state-of-the-art chemical, biological
and genetic equipment.

noExam.title: No stressful entrance exams
noExam.text:
We don't stress applicants with entrance tests —
a short indisposition shouldn't decide a future.
Admission is based on high-school results.

individual.title: Individual approach
individual.text:
With fewer students than “big” universities,
you study in smaller groups and teachers have
time to help individually.

life.title: Student life
life.text:
- Scholarships can boost your student life.
- Wi-Fi everywhere you go.
- Get an ISIC card for student discounts.
- Tasty and affordable meals in the canteen.
